person.content:
Please identify the "Person" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Member of Parliament Tony Marlow said the resignation of the chancellor of the exchequer was the only way to make the Conservatives electable in a general election which must take place by May next year .

Let's think step by step.

The "Person" entities in the paragraph are:

1. Tony Marlow - Member of Parliament
2. The chancellor of the exchequer - (name not specified)

Therefore, the "Person" entities in the paragraph are Tony Marlow and the unnamed chancellor of the exchequer.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Person.

Sure, my apologies for the mistake. Here are the "Person" entities in the paragraph after removing irrelevant entities:

1. Tony Marlow

So, the only "Person" entity in the paragraph is Tony Marlow.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here's the Markdown table with the "Person" entities in the paragraph:

| Person |
| --- |
| Tony Marlow |
